head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HART, KITTY CARLISLE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HART, KITTY CARLISLE

block.p: HART--Kitty Carlisle. In memory of our talented, joyous friend Kitty. Catherine $(6$)HART--Kitty Carlisle. A beloved friend of our foundation and a devoted supporter of its mission to help visual artists. We shall miss her deeply. Eugene Victor Thaw, President Emeritus Charles C. Bergman, Chairman and CEO Samuel Sachs II, President
